verses.name: Numbers 28:25
verses.text: And on the seventh day ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work.

verses.name: Numbers 28:26
verses.text: Also in the day of the firstfruits, when ye bring a new meat offering unto the Lord, after your weeks be out, ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work:

verses.name: Numbers 28:27
verses.text: But ye shall offer the burnt offering for a sweet savour unto the Lord; two young bullocks, one ram, seven lambs of the first year;

verses.name: Numbers 28:28
verses.text: And their meat offering of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals unto one bullock, two tenth deals unto one ram,
